fields.name: AAM 1
fields.Full_description: Status, BOOLEAN, A = Arrival circle entered, V = not passed

fields.name: AAM 2
fields.Full_description: Status, BOOLEAN, A = perpendicular passed at waypoint, V = not passed

fields.name: ALM 1
fields.short_description: Total number of messages SID ALM_1

fields.name: ALM 5
fields.Full_description: SV health, bits 17-24 of each almanac page

fields.name: ALM 9
fields.short_description: Rate of Right Ascension SID ALM_9

fields.name: ALM 12
fields.short_description: Longitude of ascension node SID ALM_12

fields.name: APA 1
fields.Full_description: Status V = Loran-C Blink or SNR warning V = general warning flag or other navigation systems when a reliable fix is not available

fields.name: APA 2
fields.Full_description: Status V = Loran-C Cycle Lock warning flag A = OK or not used

fields.name: APA 3
fields.short_description: Cross Track Error Magnitude SID APA_3

fields.name: APA 4
fields.Full_description: Direction to steer, L or R

fields.name: APA 5
fields.Full_description: Cross Track Units (Nautic miles or kilometers)

fields.name: APA 7
fields.Full_description: Status A = Perpendicular passed at waypoint

fields.name: APA 8
fields.short_description: Bearing origin to destination SID APA_8

fields.name: APB 1
fields.Full_description: Status V = Loran-C Blink or SNR warning V = general warning flag or other navigation systems when a reliable fix is not available

fields.name: APB 2
fields.Full_description: Status V = Loran-C Cycle Lock warning flag A = OK or not used

fields.name: APB 3
fields.short_description: Cross Track Error Magnitude SID APB_3

fields.name: APB 4
fields.Full_description: Direction to steer, L or R

fields.name: APB 5
fields.Full_description: Cross Track Units, N = Nautical Miles

fields.name: APB 7
fields.Full_description: Status A = Perpendicular passed at waypoint

fields.name: APB 8
fields.short_description: Bearing origin to destination SID APB_8

fields.name: APB 13
fields.Full_description: Heading to steer to destination waypoint
fields.short_description: Heading to steer to destination waypoint SID APB_13

sentence_description: Bearing & Distance to Waypoint - Great Circle

fields.name: BWC 13
fields.Full_description: FAA mode indicator (NMEA 2.3 and later, optional)

sentence_description: Bearing and Distance to Waypoint - Rhumb Line

fields.name: DCN 3
fields.short_description: Red Line Of Position SID DCN_3

fields.name: DCN 4
fields.short_description: Red Master Line Status SID DCN_4

fields.name: DCN 6
fields.short_description: Green Line Of Position SID DCN_6

fields.name: DCN 7
fields.short_description: Green Master Line Status SID DCN_7

fields.name: DCN 9
fields.short_description: Purple Line Of Position SID DCN_9

fields.name: DCN 10
fields.short_description: Purple Master Line Status SID DCN_10

fields.name: DCN 11
fields.short_description: Red Line Navigation Use SID DCN_11

fields.name: DCN 12
fields.short_description: Green Line Navigation Use SID DCN_12

fields.name: DCN 13
fields.short_description: Purple Line Navigation Use SID DCN_13

fields.name: DCN 16
fields.Full_description: Fix Data Basis - 1 = Normal Pattern - 2 = Lane Identification Pattern - 3 = Lane Identification Transmissions

fields.name: DPT 2
fields.Full_description: Offset from transducer, positive means distance from tansducer to water line negative means distance from transducer to keel

fields.name: DTM 2
fields.Full_description: Local datum subcode.  May be blank.

fields.name: DTM 7
fields.short_description: Altitude offset in meters SID DTM_7

fields.name: DTM 8
fields.Full_description: Datum name. What's usually seen here is "W84", the standard WGS84 datum used by GPS.

fields.name: GBS 1
fields.Full_description: UTC time of the GGA or GNS fix associated with this sentence
fields.short_description: UTC time of the GGA SID GBS_1

fields.name: GBS 2
fields.short_description: Expected error in latitude SID GBS_2

fields.name: GBS 3
fields.short_description: Expected error in longitude SID GBS_3

fields.name: GBS 4
fields.short_description: Expected error in altitude SID GBS_4

fields.name: GBS 5
fields.Full_description: PRN of most likely failed satellite
fields.short_description: PRN of most likely failed satellite SID GBS_5

fields.name: GBS 6
fields.Full_description: Probability of missed detection for most likely failed satellite
fields.short_description: Probability of missed detection SID GBS_6

fields.name: GBS 7
fields.Full_description: Estimate of bias in meters on most likely failed satellite
fields.short_description: Estimate of bias in meters SID GBS_7

fields.name: GBS 8
fields.short_description: Standard deviation of bias estimate SID GBS_8

fields.name: GGA 6
fields.Full_description: GPS Quality Indicator, - 0 - fix not available, - 1 - GPS fix, - 2 - Differential GPS fix (values above 2 are 2.3 features) - 3 = PPS fix - 4 = Real Time Kinematic - 5 = Float RTK - 6 = estimated (dead reckoning) - 7 = Manual input mode - 8 = Simulation mode

fields.name: GGA 7
fields.short_description: Number of satellites in view SID GGA_7

fields.name: GGA 8
fields.short_description: Horizontal Dilution of precision SID GGA_8

fields.name: GGA 10
fields.short_description: Units of antenna altitude SID GGA_10

fields.name: GGA 11
fields.Full_description: Geoidal separation, the difference between the WGS-84 earth ellipsoid and mean-sea-level (geoid), "-" means mean-sea-level below ellipsoid

fields.name: GGA 12
fields.short_description: Units of geoidal separation SID GGA_12

fields.name: GGA 13
fields.Full_description: Age of differential GPS data, time in seconds since last SC104 type 1 or 9 update, null field when DGPS is not used
fields.short_description: Age of differential GPS data SID GGA_13

fields.name: GGA 14
fields.short_description: Differential reference station ID SID GGA_14

fields.name: GLC 3
fields.short_description: Master TOA Signal Status SID GLC_3

fields.name: GLC 5
fields.short_description: Time Difference 1 Signal Status SID GLC_5

fields.name: GLC 7
fields.short_description: Time Difference 2 Signal Status SID GLC_7

fields.name: GLC 9
fields.short_description: Time Difference 3 Signal Status SID GLC_9

fields.name: GLC 11
fields.short_description: Time Difference 4 Signal Status SID GLC_11

fields.name: GLC 13
fields.short_description: Time Difference 5 Signal Status SID GLC_13

fields.name: GLL 6
fields.Full_description: Status A - Data Valid, V - Data Invalid

fields.name: GRS 1
fields.Full_description: TC time of associated GGA fix
fields.short_description: TC time of associated GGA fix SID GRS_1

fields.name: GRS 2
fields.Full_description: 0 = Residuals used in GGA, 1 = residuals calculated after GGA

fields.name: GRS 3
fields.short_description: Satellite 1 residual in meters SID GRS_3

fields.name: GRS 4
fields.short_description: Satellite 2 residual in meters SID GRS_4

fields.name: GRS 5
fields.short_description: Satellite 3 residual in meters SID GRS_5

fields.name: GRS 6
fields.Full_description: Satellite 4 residual in meters (blank if unused)
fields.short_description: Satellite 4 residual in meters SID GRS_6

fields.name: GRS 7
fields.Full_description: Satellite 5 residual in meters (blank if unused)
fields.short_description: Satellite 5 residual in meters SID GRS_7

fields.name: GRS 8
fields.Full_description: Satellite 6 residual in meters (blank if unused)
fields.short_description: Satellite 6 residual in meters SID GRS_8

fields.name: GRS 9
fields.Full_description: Satellite 7 residual in meters (blank if unused)
fields.short_description: Satellite 7 residual in meters SID GRS_9

fields.name: GRS 10
fields.Full_description: Satellite 8 residual in meters (blank if unused)
fields.short_description: Satellite 8 residual in meters SID GRS_10

fields.name: GRS 11
fields.Full_description: Satellite 9 residual in meters (blank if unused)
fields.short_description: Satellite 9 residual in meters SID GRS_11

fields.name: GRS 12
fields.Full_description: Satellite 10 residual in meters (blank if unused)
fields.short_description: Satellite 10 residual in meters SID GRS_12

fields.name: GRS 13
fields.Full_description: Satellite 11 residual in meters (blank if unused)
fields.short_description: Satellite 11 residual in meters SID GRS_13

fields.name: GRS 14
fields.Full_description: Satellite 12 residual in meters (blank if unused)
fields.short_description: Satellite 12 residual in meters SID GRS_14

fields.name: GST 1
fields.Full_description: TC time of associated GGA fix
fields.short_description: TC time of associated GGA fix SID GST_1

fields.name: GST 2
fields.Full_description: Total RMS standard deviation of ranges inputs to the navigation solution
fields.short_description: Total RMS standard deviation SID GST_2

fields.name: GST 3
fields.Full_description: Standard deviation (meters) of semi-major axis of error ellipse

fields.name: GST 4
fields.Full_description: Standard deviation (meters) of semi-minor axis of error ellipse

fields.name: GST 5
fields.Full_description: Orientation of semi-major axis of error ellipse (true north degrees)

fields.name: GSA 1
fields.Full_description: Selection mode: M=Manual, forced to operate in 2D or 3D, A=Automatic, 3D/2D

fields.name: GSA 3
fields.Full_description: ID of 1st satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 1st satellite used for fix SID GSA_3

fields.name: GSA 4
fields.Full_description: ID of 2nd satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 2nd satellite used for fix SID GSA_4

fields.name: GSA 5
fields.Full_description: ID of 3rd satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 3rd satellite used for fix SID GSA_5

fields.name: GSA 6
fields.Full_description: ID of 4th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 4th satellite used for fix SID GSA_6

fields.name: GSA 7
fields.Full_description: ID of 5th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 5th satellite used for fix SID GSA_7

fields.name: GSA 8
fields.Full_description: ID of 6th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 6th satellite used for fix SID GSA_8

fields.name: GSA 9
fields.Full_description: ID of 7th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 7th satellite used for fix SID GSA_9

fields.name: GSA 10
fields.Full_description: ID of 8th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 8th satellite used for fix SID GSA_10

fields.name: GSA 11
fields.Full_description: ID of 9th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 9th satellite used for fix SID GSA_11

fields.name: GSA 12
fields.Full_description: ID of 10th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 10th satellite used for fix SID GSA_12

fields.name: GSA 13
fields.Full_description: ID of 11th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 11th satellite used for fix SID GSA_13

fields.name: GSA 14
fields.Full_description: ID of 12th satellite used for fix
fields.short_description: ID of 12th satellite used for fix SID GSA_14

fields.name: GSV 1
fields.Full_description: total number of GSV messages to be transmitted in this group
fields.short_description: total number of GSV messages SID GSV_1

fields.name: GSV 2
fields.Full_description: 1-origin number of this GSV message  within current group

fields.name: GSV 3
fields.Full_description: total number of satellites in view (leading zeros sent)
fields.short_description: total number of satellites in view SID GSV_3

fields.name: GSV 6
fields.Full_description: azimuth in degrees to true north (000-359) (leading zeros sent)
fields.short_description: azimuth in degrees to true north SID GSV_6

fields.name: GSV 7
fields.Full_description: SNR in dB (00-99) (leading zeros sent) more satellite info quadruples like 4-7 n) checksum

fields.name: GXA 1
fields.short_description: UTC of position fix SID GXA_1

fields.name: HDG 1
fields.short_description: Magnetic Sensor heading in degrees SID HDG_1

fields.name: HDG 3
fields.Full_description: Magnetic Deviation direction, E = Easterly, W = Westerly

fields.name: HDG 5
fields.Full_description: Magnetic Variation direction, E = Easterly, W = Westerly

sentence_description: Trawl Headrope to Footrope and Bottom

fields.name: HFB 1
fields.short_description: Distance from headrope to footrope SID HFB_1

fields.name: HFB 3
fields.short_description: Distance from headrope to bottom SID HFB_3

fields.name: ITS 5
fields.short_description: Time Difference 1 Signal Status SID ITS_5

fields.name: ITS 7
fields.short_description: Time Difference 2 Signal Status SID ITS_7

fields.name: ITS 9
fields.short_description: Time Difference 3 Signal Status SID ITS_9

fields.name: ITS 11
fields.short_description: Time Difference 4 Signal Status SID ITS_11

fields.name: ITS 13
fields.short_description: Time Difference 5 Signal Status SID ITS_13

fields.name: MSK 5
fields.Full_description: Frequency for MSS message status (null for no status)
fields.short_description: Frequency for MSS message status SID MSK_5

fields.name: MSS 2
fields.short_description: Signal to noise ratio SID MSS_2

fields.name: RMB 3
fields.Full_description: Direction to Steer, Left or Right

fields.name: RMB 10
fields.Full_description: Range to destination in nautical miles
fields.short_description: Range to destination in nautical miles SID RMB_10

fields.name: RMB 11
fields.Full_description: Bearing to destination in degrees True
fields.short_description: Bearing to destination in degrees True SID RMB_11

fields.name: RMB 12
fields.short_description: Destination closing velocity in knots SID RMB_12

fields.name: RMB 13
fields.Full_description: Arrival Status, A = Arrival Circle Entered

fields.name: ROT 1
fields.Full_description: Rate Of Turn, degrees per minute, "-" means bow turns to port

fields.name: ROT 2
fields.Full_description: Status, A means data is valid

fields.name: RPM 2
fields.short_description: Engine or shaft number SID RPM_2

fields.name: RPM 4
fields.Full_description: Propeller pitch, % of maximum, "-" means astern

fields.name: RPM 5
fields.Full_description: Status, A means data is valid

fields.name: RSA 1
fields.Full_description: Starboard (or single) rudder sensor, "-" means Turn To Port

fields.name: RSA 2
fields.Full_description: Status, A means data is valid

fields.name: RSA 4
fields.Full_description: Status, A means data is valid

fields.name: RSD 9
fields.short_description: Cursor Range From Own Ship SID RSD_9

fields.name: RSD 10
fields.Full_description: Cursor Bearing Degrees Clockwise From Zero
fields.short_description: Cursor Bearing Degrees Clockwise From Zero SID RSD_10

fields.name: RTE 1
fields.Full_description: Total number of messages being transmitted
fields.short_description: Total number of messages being transmitted SID RTE_1

fields.name: RTE 3
fields.Full_description: Message mode c = complete route, all waypoints w = working route, the waypoint you just left, the waypoint you're heading to, then all the rest

fields.name: SFI 1
fields.short_description: Total Number Of Messages SID SFI_1

fields.name: TDS 1
fields.Full_description: Horizontal distance from the vessel center line
fields.short_description: Horizontal distance from the vessel center line SID TDS_1

fields.name: TDS 3
fields.Full_description: Horizontal distance from the transducer to the trawl along the vessel center line. The value is normally positive assuming the trawl is located behind the vessel.
fields.short_description: Horizontal distance from the transducer SID TDS_3

fields.name: TDS 5
fields.Full_description: Depth of the trawl below the surface
fields.short_description: Depth of the trawl below the surface SID TDS_5

fields.name: TPR 1
fields.short_description: Horizontal range relative to target SID TPR_1

fields.name: TPR 3
fields.Full_description: Bearing to target relative to vessel heading.  Resolution is one degree.
fields.short_description: Bearing to target relative to vessel heading SID TPR_3

fields.name: TPR 5
fields.Full_description: Depth of trawl below the surface
fields.short_description: Depth of trawl below the surface SID TPR_5

fields.name: TPT 1
fields.short_description: Horizontal range relative to target SID TPT_1

fields.name: TPT 3
fields.Full_description: True bearing to taget (ie. relative north).  Resolution is one degree.
fields.short_description: True bearing to taget SID TPT_3

fields.name: TPT 5
fields.Full_description: Depth of trawl below the surface
fields.short_description: Depth of trawl below the surface SID TPT_5

fields.name: TRF 9
fields.short_description: Number of Doppler intervals SID TRF_9

fields.name: TTM 3
fields.short_description: Bearing from own ship SID TTM_3

fields.name: VHW 5
fields.Full_description: Knots (speed of vessel relative to the water)

fields.name: VHW 7
fields.Full_description: Kilometers (speed of vessel relative to the water)

sentence_description: Track made good and Ground speed

fields.name: VTG 7
fields.short_description: Speed Kilometers Per Hour SID VTG_7

fields.name: VWR 1
fields.short_description: Wind direction magnitude in degrees SID VWR_1

fields.name: XTE 1
fields.Full_description: Status - V = Loran-C Blink or SNR warning - V = general warning flag or other navigation systems when a reliable fix is not available

fields.name: XTE 2
fields.Full_description: Status - V = Loran-C Cycle Lock warning flag - A = OK or not used

fields.name: XTE 3
fields.short_description: Cross Track Error Magnitude SID XTE_3

fields.name: XTE 4
fields.Full_description: Direction to steer, L or R

fields.name: XTE 5
fields.Full_description: Cross Track Units, N = Nautical Miles

fields.name: XTE 6
fields.Full_description: FAA mode indicator (NMEA 2.3 and later, optional)

fields.name: XTR 1
fields.short_description: Magnitude of cross track error SID XTR_1

fields.name: XTR 2
fields.Full_description: Direction to steer, L or R

sentence_description: Time & Date - UTC, day, month, year and local time zone

fields.name: ZDA 1
fields.Full_description: UTC time (hours, minutes, seconds, may have fractional subsecond)

fields.name: ZDA 6
fields.Full_description: Local zone minutes description, apply same sign as local hours
fields.short_description: Local zone minutes description SID ZDA_6
